paragraphs: Selveni, you have to make it to the False Martyrs' Folly. Just don't think about the the legion of hostile Daedra who want to tear your arms off. And definitely don't think about the wasteland filled with magma and lightning you have to cross. Or the weight of all this responsibility.
Think of the two spirits who are trapped there. You have the Mother Stones, remember that and keep moving. It's only one step at a time.
No. I can't do this! Not on my own. What were the Three thinking when they sent me here?
